patthana22.30:1.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.30:2.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanoāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.30:3.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.30:4.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.30:5.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naāsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.30:6.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naāsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.30:7.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho āsavo ceva sāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.30:8.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.30:9.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho āsavo
patthana22.30:9.1_1: ceva āsavasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.30:10.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho āsavasampayutto
patthana22.30:10.1_1: ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.30:11.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.30:12.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
